name: musgo
description: Musgo is a classless, minimalistic CSS framework designed for simplicity and elegance.

scripts.build:sass: sass css/scss/musgo.scss dist/musgo.css && sass css/scss/musgo-block-grid.scss dist/musgo-block-grid.css
scripts.build:postcss: postcss dist/musgo.css -o dist/musgo.css && postcss dist/musgo-block-grid.css -o dist/musgo-block-grid.css
scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run build:postcss

author: @uminocelo
